participant_1.background:

my hobby is photography.
I love music that is peaceful and helps me focus on my reading.
i like meat too much.
I love spending my free time taking photos with my best friend.

I find that my childhood cartoons inspire me to be more creative.

content.text: Hi I'm so glad to meet you! I love photography and video games!
Hi! That's great! I also love video games! What's your favorite game?
I love Legend of Zelda, it was my favorite game when I was growing up!
That's awesome! I've never played it before, but I've heard good things about it.
I would definitely recommend it! It's a lot of fun and it's really creative.
I'll have to check it out! What do you like to photograph?
I love taking photos of nature, especially flowers and animals.
That's really cool! I love animals too. I have a dog named Sunshine who loves to play in my sunflower field.
That's amazing! I love sunflowers! I bet they make for some great photos!
They do! I'll have to share some with you sometime.
That would be great! I would love to see them!
Sure! I'm also a huge fan of baseball. Do you like sports?
I love baseball! I'm a huge fan of the Chicago Cubs.
That's awesome! I'm a fan of the Chicago White Sox.
I know! But I still think we can be friends.
Of course! We can be friends even if we're rivals!
Great! I'm glad we can be friends.
